data.actual_result: The app crashes upon pressing "Use Photo"
data.expected_result: You're taken into the upload window to add a comment
data.short_description: Uploading a picture taken in Take Photo or Video while the keyboard is up causes the app to crash (iOS 10-11 only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel and open your keyboard - Click the paperclip to upload an image and choose Take Photo or Video - Take a quick picture and attempt to upload it
